title: Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Chest:, Three Drawers, Low, Long Pulls, Centered", 1929–31
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamped in black ink: Upper left, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES; LOWER RIGHT, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ 345 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite throughout, measurements and materials; lower right hand corner, [Deskey #] 7403
description: Chest of drawers for the Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Greene apartment. Drawing in upper right corner shows chest with three rectangular drawers at center; curved sides, straight back. Drawers have long glass handles at center of each drawer. Drawers on a small platform of bleached white sycamore; white lacquered sides; bleached white sycamore top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Chest:, Three Drawers, Low, Long Pulls, Centered", 1929–31.
1929–31. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1797.
